title: Writing style
order: 30
---

The University [writing guidance](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/style-guides/writing/) contains:

- [Inclusive writing guide](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/style-guides/writing/house-style/), including using short sentences, avoiding complicated language and defining acronyms the first time they're used.

- [House style guide](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/style-guides/writing/house-style/), including the use of UK English, common terminology like dates and figures, punctuation and formatting.
